member.name: M:TappitSports.Controllers.PeopleWithFavouriteSportsController.GetPeopleWithFavouriteSports
member.summary: Returns a list of people along with their favourite sports

member.name: M:TappitSports.Controllers.PersonWithFavouriteSportsController.GetPersonWithFavouriteSport(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String)
member.summary: Returns a person and their favourite sports based on the provided person Id OR last name

param.name: personId
param.description: The ID of the person you wish to retrieve. Will override last name if ID and last name do not match.

param.name: personLastName
param.description: The last name of the person you wish to retrieve

member.name: M:TappitSports.Controllers.SportsWithFavouriteCountController.GetSportsWithFavouriteCount
member.summary: Returns a list of sports and how many times they have been favourited
